source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000010_AYMERIC<tab>To think the moogles would prove such harsh taskmasters! Forgive me, I did not know you had suffered so in your quest for the horn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000010_AYMERIC<tab>Значит, муглы оказались суровыми надзирателями! Прости, я и не думал, что тебе пришлось так страдать в поисках рога.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000020_AYMERIC<tab>I must say, your spirited accounts always come as a welcome change from the arid reports which fill my days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000020_AYMERIC<tab>Должен сказать, твои весёлые истории отлично разбавили мои дни, полные сухих рапортов.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000030_AYMERIC<tab>Though I have lived in these lands my entire life, to hear you speak of them, there is much and more I have yet to see. Truly, yours was a marvelous journey.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000030_AYMERIC<tab>Подумать только, я живу на этой земле всю свою жизнь, а вокруг оказалось столько секретов? В самом деле, удивительное у тебя было путешествие.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Though perhaps a bit long for my liking.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Слишком длинное, как на мой вкус.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why not join me on the next?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Так присоединяйся в следующий раз!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>It wasn't all sunshine and lemoncakes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>По правде сказать, оно было не особенно весёлым...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000040_AYMERIC<tab>Long <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> arduous, aye. Not unlike the journey that Ishgard has at last embarked upon─thanks to the efforts of you and yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000040_AYMERIC<tab>Длинное и, без сомнения, изматывающее, да. Прямо как путь Ишгарда - благодаря, опять таки, тебе и твоим усилиями.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000050_AYMERIC<tab>Hah! Well...truth be told, when I think back on the sweeping vistas of the Churning Mists, I do feel some slight pangs of wanderlust...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000050_AYMERIC<tab>Ха! Ну-у-у... Если без шуток, то, вспоминая пейзажи Пушистых Облаков, мне и в самом деле порой хочется сняться с места и отправиться к горизонту...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000060_AYMERIC<tab>Alas, much as I would like to accept your invitation, I fear my present duties with the House of Lords demand my undivided attention. Someday, perhaps.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000060_AYMERIC<tab>Увы, разумеется, хотя я был бы и рад принять предложение, нынешние обязанности в совете Лордов требуют моего полного внимания. Когда-нибудь, быть может.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000070_AYMERIC<tab>Nor would I presume to imply otherwise. Neither I nor any man alive can truly understand what you have endured, and I cannot say with any confidence that I would have acquitted myself as well under the circumstances─much less grown stronger for it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000070_AYMERIC<tab>Разумеется, разумеется. Не думаю, что кто-либо из живущих способен вынести то же, что выпало на твою долю. Я сам бы точно сломался под таким грузом - а ты лишь становишься сильнее.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000080_AYMERIC<tab>By your deeds, you have helped us to lay the foundation for lasting reform.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000080_AYMERIC<tab>Своими деяниями ты <var 08 E905 ((помогла)) ((помог)) /var> нам заложить фундамент для предстоящей реформы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000090_AYMERIC<tab>The formation of the republic is but the beginning, for it is not only our system of governance which must needs change. We the people must learn to let go of our hatreds and rise above our bloody past.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000090_AYMERIC<tab>Основание республики - это только начало, ведь измениться должна не только лишь система управления. Люди - вот кому нужно отпустить ненависть и вырасти над своим кровавым прошлым.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000100_AYMERIC<tab>I only pray that I live long enough to see us achieve some measure of success─that I might know the lost did not die in vain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000100_AYMERIC<tab>Я лишь надеюсь, что проживу достаточно долго, дабы увидеть первые плоды наших стараний - чтобы я мог умереть, зная, что всё было не напрасно.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000110_AYMERIC<tab>I can still see you there, on the Steps of Faith, striding fearlessly towards the wyrm... If you could do that, who are we to balk at the challenges ahead?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000110_AYMERIC<tab>Ты у меня всё ещё перед глазами - тогда, на Шагах Судьбы, стоишь против змия... Если <var 1A 02 /var>такое<var 1A 01 /var> тебе под силу... Нам должно быть стыдно, жалуйся мы на <var 1A 02 /var>наши<var 1A 01 /var> испытания.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000120_AYMERIC<tab>The question of how best to strengthen ties with the other great nations of Eorzea has been debated at length in the Lords and Commons of late.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000120_AYMERIC<tab>Вопрос о том, как усилить узы между нациями Эорзии, меж тем, всё ещё открыт и бесконечно долго обсуждается в советах Лордов и Общин.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000130_AYMERIC<tab>As you may imagine, maintaining stability during this period of historic upheaval is our paramount concern. Nevertheless, we are greatly indebted to the Alliance for their support during the grand melee, and it would be remiss of us not to repay their faith in kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000130_AYMERIC<tab>Можешь представить, насколько важно поддерживать стабильность во время нынешнего исторического периода. Не стоит забывать и о неоценимой помощи, оказанной нам Альянсом во время наших с ними тренировочных манёвров, и этот долг нам ещё предстоит оплатить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000140_AYMERIC<tab>Of course, we owe you the greatest debt of all, and it is my hope that in extending our support to you and the Scions, we might also express our gratitude to our neighbors─nay, our fellow Eorzeans, whom we pray you will continue to protect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000140_AYMERIC<tab>Конечно, больше всего мы обязаны тебе - надеюсь, нашей помощью тебе и Хранителям мы тем самым косвенно помогли нашим соседям. Нет, Эорзии в целом - которую, как мы надеемся, ты продолжишь защищать!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000150_AYMERIC<tab>The Lords and Commons agree on very little, but not a soul in either house begrudges your order this offer of patronage. For all you have done and will do, we thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000150_AYMERIC<tab>Совет Лордов и совет Общин мало в чём сходятся, но в этом они были единодушны - и подписали приказ о помощи Хранителям. Мы благодарим за всё, что вы для нас сделали.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000160_AYMERIC<tab>...May I ask a personal question?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000160_AYMERIC<tab>...Могу я задать личный вопрос?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000170_AYMERIC<tab>Now that the dust has settled, what will you do? Not as a Scion, I mean, but...what do you want for yourself?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000170_AYMERIC<tab>Теперь, когда пыль осела, что ты собираешься делать? Не в качестве Хранителя, конечно, а... чего бы тебе хотелось для себя?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000180_MESSENGER02341<tab>Lord Commander, pray forgive the interruption!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000180_MESSENGER02341<tab>Лорд-командующий, простите, что прерываем!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000190_AYMERIC<tab>News from House Fortemps?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000190_AYMERIC<tab>Новости от Фортамов?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000200_MESSENGER02341<tab>An urgent message for the Warrior of Light. I was instructed to deliver it without delay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000200_MESSENGER02341<tab>Срочные вести для Воина Света. Мне приказали доставить сообщение без промедления.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000210_MESSENGER02341<tab>Master Thancred returned to the manor a short time ago, bearing an injured maiden.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000210_MESSENGER02341<tab>Господин Танкред только что вернулся в имение, он нёс на руках раненую девушку.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000220_MESSENGER02341<tab>Master Leveilleur and Mistress Tataru are tending to her wounds, but they like not her chances. Respectfully, my lord─they have requested the Warrior of Light's immediate presence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000220_MESSENGER02341<tab>Господин Левейё и госпожа Татару занялись ею, но, похоже, раны слишком серьёзные. Со всем уважением, милорд - но они просили немедленного присутствия Воина Света.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000230_AYMERIC<tab>You must go to them, my friend. And I shall go with you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000230_AYMERIC<tab>Тебе нужно идти к ним, друг мой. И я отправлюсь с тобой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000240_PAPALYMO<tab>For every ending marks a new beginning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000240_PAPALYMO<tab>Что-то кончается, что-то начинается.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000250_PAPALYMO<tab>From tragedy and sacrifice we rise to greet a new dawn. As did <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000250_PAPALYMO<tab>Вчера трагедия и жертвы, а сегодня новый рассвет. Таков <var 08 E905 ((её)) ((его)) /var> путь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000260_PAPALYMO<tab>Only to be drawn unto another battlefield, another cause, as if by fate...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000260_PAPALYMO<tab>Путь, что ведёт на очередное поле боя, к очередному сражению, словно бы по велению судьбы...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000270_ALISAIE<tab>Th...As─ Ugh... <gasp>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000270_ALISAIE<tab>Т-Т... А-а... Уф.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000280_AYMERIC<tab>Is that...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000280_AYMERIC<tab>Это?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000290_THANCRED<tab>Alisaie, Alphinaud's twin sister.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000290_THANCRED<tab>Ализе, сестра-близнец Альфино.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000300_THANCRED<tab>She ran afoul of the Warriors of Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000300_THANCRED<tab>Она напоролась на Воинов Тьмы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000310_THANCRED<tab>I had been tracking them since the ceremony at Falcon's Nest. Little did I know I was not the only one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000310_THANCRED<tab>Я следил за ними ещё с момента церемонии в Гнезде Сокола. Слишком поздно понял, что не я один был такой умный.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000320_THANCRED<tab>Evidently she had learned of their activities and attempted to shadow them on her own. Poorly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000320_THANCRED<tab>Каким-то образом она прознала об их планах и попыталась проследить за ними в одиночку. Как видите...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000330_THANCRED<tab>I rescued her in the Twelveswood, and together we fled north. But though I made every effort to cover our tracks, they caught up with us on the Ishgardian border, and in the ensuing struggle, Alisaie took an arrow to the shoulder.
'Twas only after we had made good our escape that I realized it was poisoned...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000330_THANCRED<tab>Я спас её в Священном Лесу, и вместе мы отправились на север. Я делал всё возможное, чтобы замести следы, но они всё равно настигли нас на ишгардской границе. Бой был коротким, и Ализе поймала стрелу в плечо.
Мы смогли сбежать, но стрела оказалась отравленной...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you for coming so quickly. And you, Ser Aymeric.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Спасибо, что так быстро <var 08 E905 ((пришла)) ((пришёл)) /var>. И вы, сэр Эмерик.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000350_AYMERIC<tab>Think nothing of it. How is she?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000350_AYMERIC<tab>Ничего, ничего. Как она?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000360_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have done all we can for now. Although the immediate danger has passed, the poison yet lingers in her blood...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Мы сделали для неё всё возможное. Непосредственного риска для жизни нет, но яд всё ещё в её крови...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000370_ALPHINAUD<tab>We came to Eorzea together, hoping to bring salvation to the realm our grandfather gave his life to protect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000370_ALPHINAUD<tab>Мы прибыли в Эорзию вместе с ней, надеясь спасти земли, за которые наш дедушка отдал жизнь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000380_ALPHINAUD<tab>But when confronted with the bitter realities of its politics and its petty powermongers, she was driven to anger─and to doubt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000380_ALPHINAUD<tab>Совсем скоро мы столкнулись с жестокой реальность - политики и ничтожные людишки, жаждущие власти. Она опустила руки... разозлилась.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000390_ALPHINAUD<tab>She refused to become embroiled in what she termed Eorzea's “squabbles,” and distanced herself from the Scions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000390_ALPHINAUD<tab>Она отказалась участвовать в, как она выразилась, "грызне" Эорзии и отдалилась от Хранителей.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though she remained hopeful of a brighter future, she would walk her own path. Would that it had not been so perilous...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Она надеялась на светлое будущее, но всё же пошла своим путём. Если бы только он не оказался настолько опасным...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000410_ALPHINAUD<tab>For all our differences, she is as dedicated as any Scion to the salvation of Eorzea. But more than that, she is my sister...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Мы совсем не похожи, но она предана Эорзии так же, как любой Хранитель. В конце концов, она моя сестра...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000420_ALPHINAUD<tab>To be reunited with her, only to lose her forever... Gods, even to speak the words...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Мы встретились снова, но лишь для того, чтобы я снова утратил её навеки... Боги, даже говорить не хочу...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000430_AYMERIC<tab>Take heart, Master Alphinaud. She will be attended by our most skilled chirurgeons.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000430_AYMERIC<tab>Крепитесь, господин Альфино. Ею займутся наши самые умелые медики.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000440_AYMERIC<tab>Bear Mistress Leveilleur to the infirmary at once. Apprise Captain Whitecape of the situation, and inform him that she is to be treated as my personal charge.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000440_AYMERIC<tab>Немедленно несите госпожу Левейё к госпиталь. Введите капитала Вайткэйпа в курс дела, и сообщите, что за неё он будет отвечать лично мне.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000450_ALISAIE<tab>W-Wait... D-Don't go... Please, come closer...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000450_ALISAIE<tab>Н-Нет... С-Стойте... Прошу, подойдите...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000460_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud... Is the Warrior of Light... Is <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> with you? D-Don't go...there is something I must say...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000460_ALISAIE<tab>Альфино... Воин Света... <var 08 E905 ((Она)) ((Он)) /var> с тобой? Н-Не уходи... мне нужно кое-что сказать...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000470_ALISAIE<tab>The Warriors of Darkness are in league with the Ascians... Slaughtering the primals is but the first step in their plan...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000470_ALISAIE<tab>Воины Тени заодно с асцианцами... Убийство праймалов - лишь первый шаг их плана...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000480_ALISAIE<tab>They make for Xelphatol to bring about Garuda's summoning... And to kill her...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000480_ALISAIE<tab>Они отправились в Зельфатол, где сейчас призывают Гаруду... Чтобы убить её...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000490_ALISAIE<tab>You must... You must stop them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000490_ALISAIE<tab>Вы должны... Их остановить...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000500_TATARU<tab>I...I shall inform the others at once!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000500_TATARU<tab>Я... Я немедленно сообщу остальным!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000510_AYMERIC<tab>Master Thancred─I would ask that you accompany Mistress Leveilleur to the infirmary. Your knowledge of her injuries may well prove useful in determining her treatment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000510_AYMERIC<tab>Господин Танкред, прошу вас отправиться с госпожой Левейё в госпиталь. Ваше знание о её ранах может помочь, когда ею начнут заниматься.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000520_THANCRED<tab>Of course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000520_THANCRED<tab>Конечно.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank the gods! What happened?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Хвала богам! Что тут стряслось?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000540_ALPHINAUD<tab>So they were unable to see the ritual to its completion... Then Garuda is no longer a threat, and whatever the Ascians and the Warriors of Darkness were planning has come to naught...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000540_ALPHINAUD<tab>Выходит, они всё-таки не успели закончить ритуал... Гаруда больше не страшна, а значит, чего бы не пытались добиться асцианцы с Воинами Тени, их план накрылся.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000550_ALPHINAUD<tab>But we should not tarry. The knights have secured our path to safety.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000550_ALPHINAUD<tab>Не стоит тут задерживаться. Рыцари уже проложили нам дорогу назад.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000560_PALADINOFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Well, well... What do we have here? You'd better not have killed the primal without us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000560_PALADINOFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Так-так, а тут у нас что? Лучше вам было не убивать праймала без нас!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000570_ALPHINAUD<tab><var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000570_ALPHINAUD<tab>Вы!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000580_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>Wait, I know you! Still walking, I see. I could have <var 1A 02 /var>sworn<var 1A 01 /var> my aim was true...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000580_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>Погоди-ка, я тебя знаю! Гляжу, ещё дышишь. Ладно. Готова поклясться, что я попала...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000590_PALADINOFDARKNESS<tab>Just what is your game? Leading us the long way, so these fools could step in and claim our prize?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000590_PALADINOFDARKNESS<tab>Что тут происходит? Вести нас окружным путём, дабы эти дурачки первыми добрались до приза?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000600_WHITEMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>Now, now. Let's not make hasty accusations. By the look of things, the ritual was proceeding as planned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000600_WHITEMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>Ну, ну. Давайте не будем делать поспешных выводов. Судя по всем, ритуал был в процессе, как и планировалось.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000610_WHITEMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>We arrived at the appointed hour. 'Twas they who erred.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000610_WHITEMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>Мы прибыли как раз вовремя. Это они вмешались.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000620_ALPHINAUD<tab>It is hopeless. We cannot face them all...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000620_ALPHINAUD<tab>Нет, бессмысленно. Мы не можем сражаться с ними всеми...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000630_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>Do mine ears deceive? A <var 1A 02 /var>boy<var 1A 01 /var>! So <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> the way of it. Twins! You had me worried for a moment there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000630_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>Но что я слышу? <var 1A 02 /var>Мальчик<var 1A 01 /var>! Вот оно что. Близнецы. А я уже было начала переживать.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000640_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>Know that I will happily make it quicker for you...if you just stand still.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000640_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>Знаешь, для тебя я сделаю это быстро... Не шевелись.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000650_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Enough, J'rhoomale. We wouldn't want to upset the man in white with any unnecessary bloodshed, now would we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000650_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Довольно, Д'хумай. Не стоит расстраивать человека в белом ненужным кровопролитием, м?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000660_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You've been awfully busy since we were kind enough to spare your lives.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000660_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Гляжу, вы не сидели без дела, после того как мы так благородно пощадили ваши жизни.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>While you were <var 1A 02 /var>idly<var 1A 01 /var> consorting with the Ascians, you mean? Seven hells! What could you possibly hope to achieve!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Вы тоже были весьма заняты, якшались с асцианцами! Седьмое пекло! И чего вы надеетесь добиться!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000680_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Should I explain it to you? Very well. Consider it a reward of sorts for beating us here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000680_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Стоит ли рассказать? Ну ладно. Считайте это наградой за то, что победили нас в этой... гонке.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000690_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You know the tale of Hydaelyn and Zodiark, I take it. Of the great sundering, and the reflections it created?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000690_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Надеюсь, вы уже знаете о Хайделин и Зодиарке? О великом расколе, когда были созданы отражения миров?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000700_ALPHINAUD<tab>Across ten and three they were divided. Reflections of the Source, each possessed of shards of Light and Dark...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000700_ALPHINAUD<tab>«Разделились на десять и три — отражения Источника, в каждом из которых был осколок Тьмы и Света...»

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000710_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Just so. One of those reflections─the one nearest to the Source─is our home. And we were the heroes blessed with Her Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000710_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Да, да, именно так. Одно из этих отражений - ближайшее к Источнику - наш дом. А мы были героями, благословлёнными Её Светом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000720_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But not all worlds hold Light and Dark in equal measure. In ours, the power of Light was greater by far.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000720_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Но не в каждом из миров Свет и Тьма равнозначны. В нашем сила Света была куда более могучей.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000730_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>So the Ascians who once threatened our home were no match, and they fell before us, one after another, till none were left. Victory, we thought...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000730_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Асцианцы, угрожавшие нашему миру, оказались бессильны против нас, и они пали, один за другим, пока не осталось ни одного. Победа! Так мы думали...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>...And then came the Light─a flood of pure, blinding radiance, annihilating shadow and color and <var 1A 02 /var>life itself<var 1A 01 /var>. Ere long, it will consume our world, leaving naught in its wake but blank perfection.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>...А потом пришёл Свет - прилив чистого, ослепляющего сияния, уничтожающий все тени, весь цвет, и <var 1A 02 /var>саму жизнь<var 1A 01 /var>. Совсем скоро он поглотит весь наш мир, и не останется ничего, кроме идеально пустого совершенства.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000750_ALPHINAUD<tab>That─ That cannot be! Do you honestly expect us to believe such a story!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Это... Это абсурд! Вы думаете, мы поверим в эту чушь!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000760_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Believe what you like. But it has happened before, on a world far removed from ours. The Thirteenth, which was swallowed by the Dark, and transformed into what you call the void.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000760_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Верь, во что хочешь. Но это уже произошло, в одном из миров, отдалённом от нашего. Тринадцатый, что был поглощён Тьмой, и превратился в нечто, ныне называемое Бездной.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000770_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Unchallenged Light would condemn us to a similar fate. And so we joined hands with our former enemies, and with their aid came here...to the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000770_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Свет, более никем не сдерживаемый, готов обречь нас на ту же участь. Мы объединились со своими бывшими врагами, с их помощью прибыли сюда... к Источнику.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000780_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>For there is but one way to restore the balance and save our home: the Ardor. Calamitous destruction with the power to break down the barriers between planes, and see our worlds rejoined.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000780_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ведь существует лишь один способ вернуть равновесие в наш мир - Ардор. Катаклизм колоссальных масштабов, силы которого будет достаточно, чтобы расколоть барьеры между мирами; чтобы наши миры стали единым.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000790_ALPHINAUD<tab>You would doom our world to save your own!? What would even become of us? Of you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000790_ALPHINAUD<tab>Вы уничтожите наш мир, чтобы спасти свой!? А что станет с нами? С вами?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000800_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Enough. I tire of talking.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000800_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Хватит. Я устал от болтовни.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000810_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You know our cause. You know what is at stake. We are prepared to do whatever it takes! Are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000810_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Вы знаете нашу цель. Знаете, что на кону. Мы пойдём на всё - на всё, что угодно! А вы?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000820_ALPHINAUD<tab>If there is aught you would say, say it. Otherwise, begone. You have no friends here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000820_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ну? Чего молчишь? Говори, если хочешь, а нет - так исчезни. Мы тебе не друзья.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie! How are you feeling?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ализе! Как ты?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000840_ALISAIE<tab>Well enough, Brother, thanks to the kindness of our hosts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000840_ALISAIE<tab>Нормально, братец, благодаря гостеприимству хозяев города.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000850_ALISAIE<tab>They told me you had departed for Xelphatol while I was still abed. I slept much better knowing that. Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000850_ALISAIE<tab>Они сказали что, пока я была без сознания, ты отправился в Зельфатол. Мне было гораздо спокойнее от этой мысли. Спасибо.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000860_ALISAIE<tab>When they told me you had departed for Xelphatol, I found that I could rest. The outcome seemed a mere formality, as did your safe return. Thank you, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000860_ALISAIE<tab>Когда они сказали, что ты отправился в Зельфатол, мне стало гораздо спокойнее на душе. Ваша битва неминуемо окончилась победой, и вы вернулись. Спасибо.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>I take it your mission was a success?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>Я так понимаю, ваша миссия была успешной?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000880_THANCRED<tab>...As if we needed any further confirmation that they are in league with the Ascians.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000880_THANCRED<tab>...Как будто нам нужно было доказательство, что они заодно с асцианцами.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000890_THANCRED<tab>...But to <var 1A 02 /var>save another world<var 1A 01 /var>? I think not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000890_THANCRED<tab>...Но их цель - спасти <var 1A 02 /var>другой мир<var 1A 01 /var>? Чушь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000900_ALPHINAUD<tab>I too thought his story fanciful at first. But it is possible there may be a kernel of truth in all of this. At the very least, none of his claims contradict the Word's account.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000900_ALPHINAUD<tab>Мне сразу их история показалась неубедительной. Хотя, возможно, в ней есть какая-то часть правды? По крайней мере, его слова не противоречат Гласу Матери.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000910_YSHTOLA<tab>You were following these people, Alisaie. Why?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000910_YSHTOLA<tab>Ты решила следить за ними, Ализе. Почему?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000920_ALISAIE<tab>During my travels, I had oft enjoyed tales of the Scions and their exploits. But after a time, I began to hear whispers of a gifted, and theretofore unknown, band of adventurers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000920_ALISAIE<tab>Пока я путешествовала, частенько мне приходилось слышать истории о Хранителях и их деяниях. Но в последнее время всё чаще стали звучать шепотки о группе неизвестных - одарённых искателей приключений.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000930_ALISAIE<tab>Adventurers who had supposedly sworn to travel the realm slaying primals in the Scions' stead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000930_ALISAIE<tab>Людей, что, судя по всему, странствуют по миру, уничтожая праймалов вместо Хранителей.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000940_ALPHINAUD<tab>The Warriors of Darkness... And in the course of investigating these rumors, you stumbled upon the Ascians' involvement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000940_ALPHINAUD<tab>Воины Тени. Итак, ты отправилась расследовать слухи, но открыла присутствие асцианцев в этом деле?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000950_ALISAIE<tab>Yes. Exactly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000950_ALISAIE<tab>Да. Именно так.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000960_AYMERIC<tab>Forgive me, but if these Warriors of Darkness mean to bring about another Calamity, to what end do they hunt primals?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000960_AYMERIC<tab>Простите, но если эти Воины Тень собираются устроить ещё один Катаклизм, зачем убивать праймалов?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000970_ALISAIE<tab>To prompt an escalation. To deepen the beast tribes' feelings of helplessness and despair, and thereby drive them to summon ever more powerful gods.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000970_ALISAIE<tab>Это эскалация. Они обостряют чувства и без того отчаявшихся, беспомощных зверолюдей, чтобы заставлять их призывать ещё более могучих богов.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000980_ALISAIE<tab>And lest we forget, these events do not occur in isolation. With their patron deities being slain left and right, the news of man's victory over Nidhogg must surely have sown panic in the minds of the beastmen. 'Tis no wonder they wish to defend themselves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000980_ALISAIE<tab>Не будем забывать, призывы не происходят без причины. Их божества уничтожаются направо и налево, а тут ещё и новости о победе человека над Нидхоггом - всё это привело зверолюдей в панику. Неудивительно, что они пытаются защищаться.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000990_AYMERIC<tab>Power answered with greater power, death with more death. A vicious cycle fueled by fear and hatred. I know its like all too well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_000990_AYMERIC<tab>Против силы выставлять ещё большую силу, а за смерть мстить десятком убийств. Проклятый круг, страх и ненависть. Как это знакомо...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001000_ALISAIE<tab>Indeed. The Ascians sow discord and desperation, and the Warriors of Darkness reap the harvest. And so it continues.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001000_ALISAIE<tab>Всё так. Асцианцы сеют раздор и отчаяние, а Воины Тени пожинают урожай. Так и продолжается.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001010_ALISAIE<tab>Yet that is not the extent of their ambitions. The Ascian himself observed that once the powerless realize that the old gods have failed them, they will have little recourse but to look to a new one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001010_ALISAIE<tab>Но это только начало. Асцианец говорил, что как только бессильные осознают, что старые боги уже не годятся, они неизбежно обратятся к новым.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001020_YSHTOLA<tab>...We cannot let that happen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001020_YSHTOLA<tab>...Нельзя этого допустить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001030_THANCRED<tab>It should come as no surprise, but Alisaie and I have uncovered evidence that the Ascians have been manipulating certain parties to ensure that a constant stream of crystals flows into the hands of the beast tribes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001030_THANCRED<tab>Вряд ли станет сюрпризом, однако нам с Ализе удалось выяснить, что асцианцы подмяли под себя кое-какие сферы, и теперь в лапы к зверолюдям течёт нескончаемый поток кристаллов.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001040_THANCRED<tab>If we sever these supply lines, we should at least be able to slow the escalation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001040_THANCRED<tab>Если оборвать эти линии снабжения, мы - по крайней мере - замедлим развитие их плана.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001050_YSHTOLA<tab>Agreed. Krile and I shall journey to Xelphatol and learn what we can of the Ixal's source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001050_YSHTOLA<tab>Согласна. Мы с Крайл отправимся в Зельфатол и попытаемся выяснить источник поставок иксалов.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001060_AYMERIC<tab>Hm. Then I, for my part, pledge to lead a similar investigation into the origin of the Gnath's supply.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001060_AYMERIC<tab>Хм. В таком случае я, в свою очередь, попрошу провести подобное же расследование касаемо гнатов.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ser Aymeric?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Сэр Эмерик?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001080_AYMERIC<tab>As a member of the Eorzean Alliance, Ishgard is honor-bound to play an active role in maintaining the security of the realm. You might also say that I have some personal motivation, given the Ascians dealings with my father.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001080_AYMERIC<tab>Как член Альянса Эорзии, Ишгард обязан играть активную роль в поддержании порядка в мире. Можно даже сказать, у меня есть и личный мотив, если вспомнить об асцианцах и их связи с моим отцом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001090_AYMERIC<tab>However, I make no secret of the fact that my knowledge of primal beings is scant at best. As such, I should be most grateful if one of your order were to assist me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001090_AYMERIC<tab>Тем не менее, присутствующие согласятся, что мои знания о праймалах, мягко говоря, поверхностные. А потому я был бы благодарен, если бы кто-нибудь из вас помог мне в предстоящем.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001100_THANCRED<tab>Allow me, Ser Aymeric. I have dealt with the Gnath before.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001100_THANCRED<tab>Позвольте я, сэр Эмерик. Мне уже приходилось иметь дело с гнатами.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let us consult with Urianger, then. Given his dedication to the study of primal beings, I should be surprised if he could not tell us something of value.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Давайте проконсультируемся с Урианже. Учитывая его широкие познания в сфере праймалов, буду удивлён, если он не посоветует нам что-нибудь полезное.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001120_ALISAIE<tab>Allow me to accompany you, Brother. And before you think to refuse, know that I am not the girl I once was. I shall not be a burden─you have my word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001120_ALISAIE<tab>Позволь присоединиться к тебе, брат. И прежде чем ты откажешь, знай - я уже не та девочка, какой однажды была. Я не стану для вас обузой, даю слово.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001130_ALPHINAUD<tab>But Alisaie, you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001130_ALPHINAUD<tab>Но, Ализе, ты же...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001140_ALPHINAUD<tab>...You are more than welcome. After all, it was you who set us upon this path.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001140_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Ну хорошо, так и быть. В конце концов, это именно благодаря тебе мы узнали обо всём этом деле.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001150_TATARU<tab>Wait a minute! I'm afraid I can't allow you to leave just yet─not until you try on the new outfit I prepared for you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001150_TATARU<tab>Погоди минутку! Боюсь, я пока не могу позволить тебе уйти - не до тех пор, как наденешь новый наряд, который я для тебя приготовила!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001160_ALISAIE<tab>Who goes there?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001160_ALISAIE<tab>Кто там?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001170_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, it's you. Forgive me for straying from the camp.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001170_ALISAIE<tab>А, это ты. Извини, что ускользнула из лагеря.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001180_ALISAIE<tab>He hasn't been feeling too welcome, to say the least. I thought a change of scenery might do him good, but, alas...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001180_ALISAIE<tab>Он кажется мне не слишком приветливым. Думала, погляди я на него со стороны, моё мнение переменится, но нет, увы...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001190_ALISAIE<tab>It's so quiet out here. The stars spread out before us, beckoning across time and space...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001190_ALISAIE<tab>Тут так тихо. И лишь звёзды над нашими головами, вечные странники необъятного космоса...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001200_ALISAIE<tab>"Dawn may banish even the darkest night.“ How bitterly beautiful, those words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001200_ALISAIE<tab>«Даже темнейшая ночь всегда отступает с рассветом.» Красивые слова, аж до противного.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001210_ALISAIE<tab>I should be stronger for all my experiences, yet my heart aches more than ever.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001210_ALISAIE<tab>Я думала, что из-за пережитого стану сильнее, но моё сердце только больше ноет.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001220_ALISAIE<tab>I never understood why Grandfather gave his life that day. I thought that, if I came here, I would find the answers I needed. But when I finally laid eyes on the land he sacrificed everything to save, saw firsthand the bickering, the pettiness...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001220_ALISAIE<tab>Я не могла понять, за что дедушка тогда отдал свою жизнь. Я думала, что, прибыв сюда, найду все ответы. Но взглянув своими глазами на земли, ради которых он пожертвовал всем, увидев всю эту мелочность и свары...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001230_ALISAIE<tab>I was disappointed. I was <var 1A 02 /var>angry<var 1A 01 /var>. I could not fathom how these people were more deserving of his love than his family...than me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001230_ALISAIE<tab>Я была разочарована. Я была в ярости. Я не представляла, почему вдруг эти люди заслужили его любви больше его собственной семьи... больше меня...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001240_ALISAIE<tab>Nevertheless, I had to believe he had good reason. I was determined to uncover the whole truth of the Calamity, and perhaps in so doing find my own purpose in this sea of chaos.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001240_ALISAIE<tab>В любом случае, я должна была убедить себя, что на то была хорошая причина. Я решила открыть тайну, стоявшую за Катаклизмом, но в процессе нашла для себя цель в этом море хаоса.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001250_ALISAIE<tab>But when Grandfather revealed the whole truth of the Calamity to us, I finally understood. And I resolved there and then to continue his legacy in my own way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001250_ALISAIE<tab>Но когда дедушка рассказал нам всю правду о Катаклизме, я, наконец, поняла. В тот момент я решила продолжить то, что начал он, - по своему.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001260_ALISAIE<tab>My travels have been enlightening, but I cannot say that I have enjoyed them. I have lost count of the many petty crises that I was helpless to resolve, and of the people whose actions I could not understand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001260_ALISAIE<tab>Мои скитания многому меня научили, но не могу сказать, что я ими наслаждалась. Я потеряла счёт, сколько раз на пути мне попадались нерешаемые проблемы; люди, чьи действия я не могла понять.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001270_ALISAIE<tab>There were others, of course. Good people. People with whom I felt a kinship...whose lives I could not save.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001270_ALISAIE<tab>Конечно, были и другие. Хорошие люди. Люди, с которыми я чувствовала себя своей... чьи жизни я не смогла уберечь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001280_ALISAIE<tab>I found myself asking what it was all for. Why try if I was doomed to fail in the end? But then I recalled Grandfather's words to my father, years ago, before he left Sharlayan behind forever.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001280_ALISAIE<tab>Я часто себя спрашивала, зачем это всё. Барахтаться, зная, что я всё равно обречена? Потом я вспомнила слова, которые дедушка сказал моему отцу - перед тем, как навсегда покинуть Шарлеан.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001290_ALISAIE<tab>"To ignore the plight of those one might conceivably save is not wisdom─it is indolence. We must all protect that which we hold most dear in the manner of our own choosing.“
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001290_ALISAIE<tab>"Отворачиваться от тех, кого мы со всей уверенностью в силах спасти - не мудрость, но невежество. Мы все должны защищать то, что нам дорого, способом, который сами изберём."

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001300_ALISAIE<tab>...We have to try, do we not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001300_ALISAIE<tab>...Или хотя бы попытаться, не так ли?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001310_ALISAIE<tab>Of course, it's one thing to try and another to do. There were times while I was tracking the Warriors of Darkness when I faltered─when I was afraid. But then I thought of my brother, of Urianger...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001310_ALISAIE<tab>Конечно, пытаться это одно, а делать - совершенно иное. Когда я преследовала Воинов Света, мне не раз было страшно, и не раз я хотела отступить. Но потом я думала о своём брате, и об Урианже...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001320_ALISAIE<tab>Of course, it's one thing to try and another to do. There were times while I was tracking the Warriors of Darkness when I faltered─when I was afraid. But then I thought of my brother, of Urianger, of you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001320_ALISAIE<tab>Конечно, пытаться это одно, а делать - совершенно иное. Когда я преследовала Воинов Света, мне не раз было страшно, и не раз я хотела отступить. Но потом я думала о своём брате, и об Урианже...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001330_ALISAIE<tab>Ah, pray forgive me. This conversation has been rather one-sided, hasn't it. Mayhap you could recount some of your adventures in Ishgard?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001330_ALISAIE<tab>О, прости. Я всё болтаю и болтаю. Может, ты что-нибудь расскажешь о твоих приключениях в Ишгарде?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I traveled far and wide with two companions, Estinien and Ysayle, who were very...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Мне довелось путешествовать с двумя товарищами, Эстиниеном и Исель. Они были очень разными...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Under some rather unique circumstances, I had the pleasure to fight alongside Ser Aymeric...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>В какой-то момент мне выпала честь сражаться плечом к плечу с сэром Эмериком...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>When Alphinaud and I came at last to the Dravanian hinterlands...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Когда мы с Альфино, наконец, добрались до Внутренних земель Дравании...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001340_ALISAIE<tab>Gods, they must have been at each other's throats from dawn till dusk...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001340_ALISAIE<tab>Боги, да они, должно быть, с утра до вечера грызлись друг с другом...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001350_ALISAIE<tab>I daresay you managed to keep the peace, though. Merely being in the presence of the Warrior of Light is surely enough to shame <var 1A 02 /var>anyone<var 1A 01 /var> into behaving.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001350_ALISAIE<tab>Но с тобой они вели себя тихо? А как же иначе? Должно быть, достаточно просто быть Воином Света, чтобы кто-угодно тебя слушался.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001360_ALISAIE<tab>He is quite a man, the lord commander. I shall have to thank him for his kindness. Truth be told, I was rather taken aback by it all. Given Ishgard's famous love of foreigners, I was half expecting the chirurgeons to berate me for bleeding.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001360_ALISAIE<tab>А они интересный человек, этот лорд-командующий. Нужно не забыть поблагодарить его за доброту. По правде говоря, у меня чуть челюсть не отвисла. Ишгард известен своей нелюбовью к чужакам. Я бы не удивилась, если бы их медики оставили меня истекать кровью.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001370_ALISAIE<tab>But I never heard an unkind word. Everyone there seemed relatively open and friendly, in fact─thanks in no small part to your tireless efforts, I suspect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001370_ALISAIE<tab>Но я не услышала от них ни единого злого cлова. Они кажутся такими открытыми, дружелюбными... Хотя, надо думать, не в последнюю очередь благодаря твоим усилиям.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001380_ALISAIE<tab>We had no clear memories of our life in the hinterlands, having returned to the motherland as infants. Nevertheless, I am quite familiar with Master Matoya, as is every Sharlayan. I should like to speak with her someday.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001380_ALISAIE<tab>У нас не осталось никаких ясных воспоминаний о Внутренних землях, ведь мы вернулись на родину совсем маленькими. И тем не менее, я хорошо знаю госпожу Матойю - как, уверена, и каждый в Шарлеане. Может ещё доведётся шанс с ней поговорить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001390_ALISAIE<tab>'Twould not surprise me if Alphinaud's recent maturation was at least somewhat due to her sage guidance. I would never tell him this, of course, but there have been moments when I've caught myself thinking of him as an <var 1A 02 /var>elder brother<var 1A 01 /var>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001390_ALISAIE<tab>Не удивлюсь, если своим "внезапным взрослением" Альфино отчасти обязан её мудрому наставничеству. Я этого ему не говорила, но порой это я в определённые моменты чувствовала себя рядом с ним "старшим братом"...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001400_ALISAIE<tab>The hopes and dreams of so many rest on your shoulders, Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001400_ALISAIE<tab>Мечты и надежды многих людей покоятся на твоих плечах, Воин Света.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001410_ALISAIE<tab>As long as the sun rises, we can but carry on. For the sake of those we hold dear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001410_ALISAIE<tab>Покуда встаёт солнце, мы должны бороться. Ради всего, что нам дорого.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001420_URIANGER<tab>To what end dost thou cling to the tainted gifts of the Mother?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001420_URIANGER<tab>Почто вы и ныне стяжаете нечистые дары Матери?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001430_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Every tool has its purpose. Even this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001430_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>У каждого орудия есть своё назначение. Даже у этого.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001440_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Well, what is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001440_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ну, что?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001450_URIANGER<tab>The seeds sown in Vylbrand have been plucked from the earth and left to wither.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001450_URIANGER<tab>Семена, засеянные на Вилбренде, не дали всходов, но лишь были вырваны и пущены по ветру.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001460_URIANGER<tab>Alas, Titan's demise sufficed not to drive the kobolds to deepest desperation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001460_URIANGER<tab>Увы, падение Титана не ввергло кобольдов в ещё более глубокое отчаяние.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001470_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>What did the man in white have to say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001470_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>А что сказал человек в белом?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001480_URIANGER<tab>That we are to proceed as he did first set forth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001480_URIANGER<tab>Мы продолжаем идти заданным курсом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001490_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Well that's easy for him to say! It's not <var 1A 02 /var>his<var 1A 01 /var> bloody world on the brink of destruction, is it!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001490_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Легко ему говорить. Это же не его чёртов мир покачивается на краю пропасти!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001500_URIANGER<tab>Be thou well reminded that with an end to Ishgard's unrest, naught now remaineth to preoccupy the Scions' thoughts. And thus may they devote their every energy to thwarting thee and thine. I foresee only greater difficulties ahead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001500_URIANGER<tab>Следует признать, что с окончанием неспокойствий в Ишгарде ничто боле не отвлекает Хранителей; а потому они с большим усердием примутся препятствовать нам. Сдаётся мне, станет только труднее.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001510_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Foresee? Are you sure you don't <var 1A 02 /var>welcome them<var 1A 01 /var>? I'm starting to think you might hold a candle for your old friends, after all...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001510_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Тебе "сдаётся"? А ты, часом, не рад этому? Начинаю думать, ты за своих старых друзей кулачки втайне держишь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001520_URIANGER<tab>Pray do not mistake mine intent. I but look upon the path which lieth before us with due trepidation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001520_URIANGER<tab>Не поймите моих намерений превратно. Я лишь гляжу на лежащий пред нами путь с должной мерой осторожности.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001530_URIANGER<tab>Shouldst thou be of like mind, pray consider, then, another course, for the power to invoke the Ardor belongeth not unto the Ascians alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001530_URIANGER<tab>И ежели сомневаетесь, так я напомню о другом пути, ибо способность призвать Ардор - не только лишь в руках асцианцев.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001540_URIANGER<tab>With thine own hand, strike down thine enemy─the so-called hero who would see thy home lost to Light. Do but this and thou wouldst, at a single stroke, disrupt the all too delicate balance of this realm, plunging her straightways into chaos.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001540_URIANGER<tab>Сразить следует собственноручно так называемых героев, лишённых сочувствия к твоему миру - миру, что готов затопить Свет. Ежели удастся, одним лишь сим деянием нарушено будет хрупкое равновесие сих земель, обрушив их в хаос.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You do realize what you're suggesting, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ты хоть понимаешь, что предлагаешь?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001560_URIANGER<tab>"To ignore the plight of those one might conceivably save is not wisdom─it is indolence.“ The words of my teacher, and a creed I hold close to my heart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001560_URIANGER<tab>"Отвернуться от иного, ежели в силах ты его спасти - сие не есть великая мудрость, но великое невежество." Слова моего учителя, кои я сделал своим кредо.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001570_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Very well. Draw <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> out. We'll make it quick.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001570_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Хорошо. Вымани <var 08 E905 ((её)) ((его)) /var>. Мы быстро разберёмся.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001580_URIANGER<tab>It shall be done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001580_URIANGER<tab>Да будет так.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001590_URIANGER<tab>What good a creed one cannot uphold? What hurts soothed, what lives saved... O hapless fool, what hast thou wrought by thine own hands?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001590_URIANGER<tab>Что с того кредо, за которое нельзя уцепиться? Кого мы выручили?.. Какие раны залечили?.. О, беспомощный дурень, что сотворил ты своими же руками?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001600_URIANGER<tab>Minfilia, my friends─I shall not now beg your forgiveness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001600_URIANGER<tab>Минфилия, друзья мои, - ещё не настал час просить у вас прощения.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001610_URIANGER<tab>Full deeply though it paineth me to walk it, I shall not stray from my chosen path. As Moenbryda remained steadfast, so too shall I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001610_URIANGER<tab>Как глубоко ранит меня нужда идти по сему пути, но свернуть не посмею. Как Мунбрида, что до последнего оставалась твёрдой, твёрдым обязан оставаться и я...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001620_IRONMASK<tab>Brothers and sisters... Twenty years ago, Ala Mhigo, our home, was claimed by the Garlean Empire.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001630_IRONMASK<tab>In our haste to overthrow the King of Ruin, we turned a blind eye to our foes in the north. With our glorious revolution, we but laid a path for a new tyrant to succeed the old...and when confronted with our failure, we fled.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001640_IRONMASK<tab>Not a day goes by that I do not think of those we left behind─think of them, and feel ashamed. And I know each and every one of you feels the same.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001650_IRONMASK<tab>We abandoned them, our own flesh and blood, to labor till their backs gave in and their breath gave out, building the twisted steel ramparts which now mar our once majestic mountains.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001660_IRONMASK<tab>We abandoned them, the brave and true, to fight and die for their country─or worse, to be conscripted and sent off to rob another poor bastard of his home.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001670_IRONMASK<tab>We abandoned them, the meek and powerless, to bow and scrape when the Garleans pass─to sully themselves that they might live to see another day of misery.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001680_IRONMASK<tab>The Black Wolf may be dead, but a new imperial viceroy reigns in Ala Mhigo now. A beast not a fraction as merciful.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001690_IRONMASK<tab>You all know the Eorzean Alliance will do naught to oppose him. For all their promises and platitudes, they will not act if there's no profit in it. Only <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> can free our brothers and sisters from the Empire's tyranny, my friends! Only we have the courage to stand and fight!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001700_IRONMASK<tab>They have imprisoned us, they have enslaved us, and they have murdered us─but no more! Blood demands blood, and the Garleans shall pay for every drop they have spilt upon our lands!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001710_IRONMASK<tab>This I promise you, for we have a power within us, my friends─a power befitting our pride, our righteousness! Only join us, and we shall grant you the means to unleash it, and together we shall see the Ala Mhigan standard raised over the mountains of Gyr Abania once more!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001720_ALPHINAUD<tab>"A power befitting their pride...“ Not at all ominous, that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wait. Is that─?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001740_YDA<tab><gasp> What are you two doing here!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001750_ALPHINAUD<tab>I could ask you the same thing!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001760_PAPALYMO<tab>Well, well, this is quite the surprise.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001770_PAPALYMO<tab>Might I suggest we continue this conversation in more...<var 1A 02 /var>agreeable<var 1A 01 /var> surroundings?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001780_IRONMASK<tab>If you see what I see, if you feel as I feel, then I bid you join us! And those of you who cannot fight, fear not. For it is not strength of arms that will win this battle, but strength of heart!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001790_IRONMASK<tab>My thanks, comrades.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001800_IRONMASK<tab>You must be the esteemed adventurers of whom I have heard so much. I understand you have taken an interest in our cause.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001810_ALPHINAUD<tab>A <var 1A 02 /var>great<var 1A 01 /var> interest, you might say.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001820_ALPHINAUD<tab>Your words have certainly made quite an impression on my friend and I. The Resistance has long─and some would say wisely─avoided open engagements with the Garleans, but you and yours seem confident against the world in arms.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001830_ALPHINAUD<tab>I can only assume you have good reason to be so bold. Why, one might even think you were planning to summon a primal.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001840_ALPHINAUD<tab>Because that would do much to explain the sizable shipment of crystals you recently received from your smuggler friends─whom our Ishgardian allies have since detained, lest you wonder.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001850_YDA<tab>I'd like to hear more about the Griffin. The <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> Griffin. Your performance earlier didn't fool us!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001860_IRONMASK<tab>Ah. The famous Scions of the Seventh Dawn. I should have known better than to think I could conceal the truth from you lot.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001870_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)You are right. I am not the Griffin. But I speak with his voice, and it was at his behest that we procured those crystals.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001880_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)You are wrong, however, if you think that we procured them to summon a primal.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001890_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)We used them to reach an accord with the Amalj'aa. In exchange for crystals to summon their god, they will aid us in the fight for Ala Mhigan liberation.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001900_YDA<tab>You've got to be joking! Have you gone completely mad!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001910_YDA<tab>When people find out you helped the lizardmen summon Ifrit, they'll turn on the Resistance! Ala Mhigo will never be free!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001920_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)This isn't a faerie tale, girl. We don't have the luxury to play at being honorable heroes.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001930_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)It's because the likes of you wouldn't sully your saintly hands that Ala Mhigo's been under the yoke for the past twenty years! But the Griffin won't stand for it, and neither will we! We're ready to do whatever it takes!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001940_PAPALYMO<tab>What proof do you have of this arrangement with the Amalj'aa?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001950_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)What, aside from a lack of crystals? None. But the beastmen have a great big pile of the things, if you fancy looking. You might want to hurry, though─it'll not be long before they summon their god.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001960_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)Search our camp if you don't believe me. We have naught to hide.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001970_PAPALYMO<tab>If there is a cache to be found, Yda and I will find it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001980_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)Then let us be off.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_001990_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)Are you perchance the Warrior of Light?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002000_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)Aye, I thought so. You should know that a great many who have joined us did so because you saved them─because you showed them that one brave <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> can make a difference.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002010_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)You saved me too, once. Helped a friend over in Quarrymill make some medicine I needed. But that was a lifetime ago...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002020_IRONMASK<tab>(-The False Griffin-)On behalf of my brothers and sisters, I thank you. You gave us hope where there was none; courage and strength when all was lost. We shall not squander your gift.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002030_PAPALYMO<tab>I know that look, Yda, and I do not like it. You cannot seriously be contemplating taking up arms with that band of cutthroats?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002040_YDA<tab>I... I just...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002050_PAPALYMO<tab>If the Griffin and his men have their way, it is only a matter of time before the situation in Ala Mhigo comes to a head.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002060_PAPALYMO<tab>Your homeland's future teeters on a knife-edge, and any reckless action, however small, could have irrevocable consequences.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002070_PAPALYMO<tab>You mustn't lose sight of that, Yda. When the time comes, we must all make our choices, but we must do so in full possession of the facts. Now let us away─there is work to be done.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002080_THANCRED<tab>This isn't right. The Amalj'aa would never leave this place so poorly guarded.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002090_ALISAIE<tab>Not willingly, no.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002100_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Hah hah! Ahhh, the saviors of Eorzea. Slow as ever.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002110_ALPHINAUD<tab>By the Twelve... Will you never learn?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002120_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You know, you're right. Mayhap it <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> time for a change of tack. Killing primals, tormenting beastmen, hastening the birth of a new god...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002130_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It's all a bit much, isn't it? And, frankly, we don't have the leisure to do it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002140_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Killing the Warrior of Light, on the other hand─that would <var 1A 02 /var>soon<var 1A 01 /var> plunge Eorzea into chaos.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002150_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>One life for one world. A fair exchange─wouldn't you agree!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002160_THANCRED<tab>Lest you forget, you've more than one opponent!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Carbuncle, defend me!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002180_BARDOFDARKNESS<tab>I sense you will offer more than mere target practice. Unlike your sister.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002200_ALISAIE<tab>Did...did I not tell you, Alphinaud? I am not the girl I once was.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002210_ALISAIE<tab>My brother was always the clever one, while my talents lay elsewhere...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002220_ALISAIE<tab>If you would dare to stand against us, to destroy all that we hold dear, then you shall die by my sword!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002230_ALISAIE<tab>As Eorzea's blade of Light once stood by my side, now I shall stand at <var 08 E905 ((hers)) ((his)) /var>─and defend this realm with all my might!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002240_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Let's finish this!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002250_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It ends, now!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>What!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002270_ALPHINAUD<tab>The chains!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002280_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>snake<var 1A 01 /var>. You would betray us as well?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002290_URIANGER<tab>He that holdeth fast unto his convictions shall never count betrayal amongst his crimes, though all the world may call him villain. My path is unchanged; my creed sacrosanct. This I believe with all my heart.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002300_URIANGER<tab>But say, Warrior of Darkness, and speak true─what dost <var 1A 02 /var>thou<var 1A 01 /var> believe? That rendering up the souls of thy world in service to the Rejoining will grant it salvation? Nay.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002310_ALPHINAUD<tab>By the Twelve─Urianger!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002320_URIANGER<tab>Mine apologies, Master Alphinaud. That the brightest light might shine, duty did compel me to walk in darkest shade.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002330_ALISAIE<tab>You sweet fool. I was almost willing to believe you had turned against us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002340_ALISAIE<tab>I expect a full explanation when this is over. For now, may I assume you have turned your cloak for the last time?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002350_URIANGER<tab>Thou mayest, my lady.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002360_URIANGER<tab>By thy leave.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002370_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Even odds, then. No matter. We'll crush the lot of you in one fell swoop!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002380_BLACKMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>Understood.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002390_ALISAIE<tab>Hearken to me! We only have one chance!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002400_ALISAIE<tab>Channel your aether into my blade that I might strike before the mage casts his spell!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002410_ALISAIE<tab>I cannot do it alone, but together...together we can defeat them!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002420_ALISAIE<tab>Make ready! They come!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002430_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie! Are you hurt?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002440_ALISAIE<tab>A touch dizzy, but otherwise fine. Thank you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002450_THANCRED<tab>And there you have it. Our friend is too stubborn to die.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002460_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Hmph. We are far from finished.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002470_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Or have you never considered how we came to this world?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002480_THANCRED<tab>Crystals? You mean...like the <var 1A 02 /var>Ascians<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002490_URIANGER<tab>Just so. As the Ascians flee unto the rift 'twixt planes with Crystals of Darkness, so did these warriors come hither with Crystals of Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002500_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Eloquent, as always. Aye, like the Ascians, we too are beyond death! You cannot defeat that which is eternal!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002510_THANCRED<tab>Hmph!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wait!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Such methods as the Ascians employ require the renunciation of the flesh. You...you would have had to...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002540_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>At long last, you see. To save our world, we gave our lives.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>We were just adventurers trying to make our way. An odd job here, a favor there─we never aspired to be Warriors of Light.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002560_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But word of our deeds spread, and soon people were calling us heroes. They placed their hopes and dreams on our shoulders and bid us fight for all that was good and right.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002570_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>We fought and we fought and we fought...until there was no one left to fight. We <var 1A 02 /var>won<var 1A 01 /var>...and now our world is being erased from existence.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002580_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>We did <var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var> right, everything that was asked of us, and still─<var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> it came to this!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002590_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You of all people should understand! We cannot─we <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> not falter. We brought our world to the brink of destruction, and now we must save it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002600_PALADINOFDARKNESS<tab>I've died before, Arbert. I'm not afraid to die again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002610_WHITEMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>No matter how many times we fall, we must rise and carry on the fight. For those we left behind.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002620_URIANGER<tab>To have known the depths of sorrow and embrace the highest sacrifice─nonetheless...Master Louisoix, guide my hand, I pray you, as fate's thread spinneth upon this most capricious spindle.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002630_URIANGER<tab>Quickly! Thou must needs invoke the power of thy crystal!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002640_ALPHINAUD<tab>What is this place?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002650_MINFILIA<tab>Such pain... Such sorrow... Oh, my dear children...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002660_THANCRED<tab>I-It can't be!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002670_URIANGER<tab>Mother Hydaelyn, hearken unto Your children's plea! From two worlds do we gather, and from two worlds do we offer a bounty of Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002680_URIANGER<tab>In this desperate hour, we do beseech Your intercession! We beg an audience with the Word of the Mother─with Your chosen, Minfilia!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002690_MINFILIA<tab>Your cries go not unheard... Nor your sacrifices unnoticed...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002700_MINFILIA<tab>Though many are lost, there are those we can yet save... Whom I can yet save...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002710_ALPHINAUD<tab>Minfilia!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002720_MINFILIA<tab>Blessed children of the First. The light of your world hath grown blinding in its radiance, but it is not yet absolute.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002730_MINFILIA<tab>I will hie me to your world and there take unto myself the Light which riseth even now to drown it, as Darkness once did drown another.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Now<var 1A 01 /var> you deign to answer our prayers!? I will suffer this farce no longer!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002750_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)As the Ascians must serve as instruments of Zodiark's will, so too must others carry out the will of Hydaelyn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002760_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)But for the boon you have granted Her, She has grown strong enough to set me free, that I might serve as Her emissary.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002770_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)Your suffering, your sacrifice, your supplications─She has heard all. We will not let the First fall to Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002780_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)Thank you, Urianger, for bringing everyone here. It fills my heart with joy to look upon the faces of my friends once more.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002790_URIANGER<tab>In taking you unto Her bosom, I knew that Hydaelyn had bequeathed to you a sliver of Her grace, granting you strength long sought.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002800_URIANGER<tab>And in treating with the Ascians, I learned of a star like unto our own─a doomed world of fallen heroes, in whom I glimpsed ourselves. The First.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002810_URIANGER<tab>Full long did I search for a means to save this world, concluding at the last that the answer lay in the power of blessed crystals. And thus did I labor to set Light against Dark.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002820_URIANGER<tab>Yet I knew from the beginning that this salvation would not come without sacrifice, for the instrument of the First's deliverance would of necessity be required to journey thither...there to remain, mayhap forever.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002830_ALPHINAUD<tab>You orchestrated all of this not to save her, but to send her away!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002840_URIANGER<tab>One life for one world. Such was the bargain, and you the coin, though it were not mine to spend.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002850_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)Have we not walked together in the light of the Crystal, and at Her bidding borne witness to the joys and sorrows of this land? Each and every one of you knows my heart. If this be the price I must pay, I pay it gladly.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002860_THANCRED<tab>...You would go alone then?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002870_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)My dearest Thancred... You who have ever watched over me... I am truly grateful for all you have done on my behalf, as would my father be.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002880_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)Your kindness, your compassion, your love... These are your gifts to me, and our gifts to them, forming a bond which transcends time and space.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002890_THANCRED<tab>Sometimes I forget you are not the child I once knew. Make me proud.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002900_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)Long have I watched you from Hydaelyn's side. Watched as you nurtured and kept safe the light of the dawn.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002910_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)The dark recesses of the world hide untold secrets and dangers. Thus do I entrust to you Tupsimati. I pray you keep to the path that you may never have need of it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002920_BLACKMAGEOFDARKNESS<tab>'Twould seem the power of our crystals is all but spent. Perhaps...if there is naught else to be done...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002930_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Hear me, servant of Hydaelyn. If you would have us place our trust in you, then I would ask a favor.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002940_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Take us with you. Take us home.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002950_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>We were blind to the truth once. So I tell you this, as one fool to another. Light, Dark, it doesn't matter. What matters is how you choose to use them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002960_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>We made our choice, and you see what came of it. So please...forge a different path. Seize a better fate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002970_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)'Tis a strange feeling. So many times have I watched you depart, my heart filled with worry, and ever did you return to me in triumph.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002980_MINFILIA<tab>(-Minfilia-)Someday, when I have found a way to free this star from Her sorrow, I promise you I shall repay the favor.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_002990_MINFILIA<tab>Thank you, Lhaminn...for everything...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003000_YDA<tab>Back in the solar! It's been too long since we were all together like this. Not since...not since after Moenbryda...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003010_PAPALYMO<tab>Much has changed since then─we ourselves most of all.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though not all who were lost could be gathered here today, we may take comfort in the knowledge that those who are not are carrying on the fight.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003030_TATARU<tab>While I am grateful to our friends in the north for their hospitality...it isn't half-good to be back!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003040_ALPHINAUD<tab>But, as Papalymo rightly said, much has changed since we last stood here. The Scions of the Seventh Dawn are not as they once were. Nor should we be.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Our travels in the north brought us into contact with a host of fine and generous people, and their selfless deeds served to show me that it is not lofty causes that should inform our actions, but our hearts.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003060_ALPHINAUD<tab>And I hope that the Scions might continue in this manner: as individuals driven by individual principles. Provided we all sincerely desire to work towards Eorzea's salvation, I believe the paths we follow to achieve it need not─and should not─be dictated by any single ideal.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003070_YSHTOLA<tab>Companions bound by a common purpose, free to go whither they will... The idea is not without merit.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003080_YSHTOLA<tab>Very well. I shall resume my research of the primals and the elder gods of Eorzea. Should anyone have need of my findings, you need only ask.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>I should be glad of your continued assistance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003100_KRILE<tab>Well, my main purpose in coming here was to see the Scions of the Seventh Dawn restored and my dear friend found...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003110_KRILE<tab>Nevertheless, having involved myself in your struggles, I feel compelled to see them through to the bitter end. For Minfilia's sake. That is, if there are no objections?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003120_ALPHINAUD<tab>You will always be welcome here, Krile.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003130_THANCRED<tab>Urianger, can we trust you to carry on your investigation of the Ascians as before?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003140_URIANGER<tab>Regardless of mine own desires, I am undeserving of your trust, having so villainously deceived you all.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003150_THANCRED<tab>Now, now, I'll hear no more of that. 'Twould be disrespectful of Minfilia's wishes.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003160_THANCRED<tab>She entrusted matters here to us, that we might protect this star and understand the truth which hides at Her heart. Mayhap I can handle the former, but I think you far better suited to the latter, no?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003170_URIANGER<tab>Very well. Then out of love for my lady Minfilia and Moenbryda both, this shall be my solemn charge.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003180_YDA<tab>I... <var 1A 02 /var>Papalymo and I<var 1A 01 /var> should probably return to Thanalan to keep an eye on the Resistance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003190_YDA<tab>There's still the matter of the Griffin and the Amalj'aa, not to mention the new imperial viceroy. That little lot must be worthy of our attention, right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003200_ALPHINAUD<tab>And what will you do, Alisaie?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003210_ALISAIE<tab>You know I have no great love for organizations and formalities.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003220_ALISAIE<tab>That being said...this new approach you propose is not wholly objectionable. And we've always got <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to keep us from bickering.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003230_ALISAIE<tab>But I will suffer no titles. I am not here for House Leveilleur, nor to walk in Grandfather's shadow.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Upon that point, we see eye to eye. If it please you, you may think of me as but another comrade-in-arms.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003250_TATARU<tab>Well then, <var 1A 02 /var>Alphy<var 1A 01 /var>─I, for my part, shall see to the paperwork and the finances with my characteristic aplomb.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003260_ALPHINAUD<tab>I would not have it any other way, Tataru.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003270_ALPHINAUD<tab>And we mustn't forget you. What now for the Warrior of Light?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>A new adventure, what else?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The road goes ever on...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A3_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>To strive for those we have lost. For those we can yet save.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_A3_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003280_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003290_YSHTOLA<tab>The path behind us was fraught with hardship, and the path before us will be no less unforgiving. But a new dawn <var 1A 02 /var>shall<var 1A 01 /var> break over the realm, and I see before me the faces of those who will deliver it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003300_PAPALYMO<tab>One world's heroes are another world's villains. One world's loss another world's gain.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003310_PAPALYMO<tab>"Where men go as one, there is life... And where there is life...“
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003320_PAPALYMO<tab>My friends. If I may, I would ask that you entrust Tupsimati to me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003330_PAPALYMO<tab>Clouds gather upon the horizon, and as Master Louisoix's disciple, I would keep it close at hand.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003340_PAPALYMO<tab>Thank you. I shall guard it well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003350_PAPALYMO<tab>"...There is cause to hope.“
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03400_003360_PAPALYMO<tab>For every ending, every parting, marks a new beginning.
